Package es.optocom.jovp.engine.rendering

Class VulkanManager

java.lang.Object
es.optocom.jovp.engine.rendering.VulkanManager
public class VulkanManager extends Object
Manages all things Vulkan: instantiation, physical and logical device, queues, swap chain, views.
Since:
0.0.1
